list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: demonstrate the truth or existence of (something) by evidence or argument.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the concept is difficult to prove
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khái niệm này rất khó để chứng minh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: demonstrate to be the specified thing by evidence or argument.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vô tội cho đến khi được chứng minh có tội

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of bread dough) become aerated by the action of yeast; rise.
subject (a gun or other item) to a testing process.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: firearms proved for black powder should not be used with smokeless ammunition
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Súng được chứng minh cho bột đen không nên được sử dụng với đạn không khói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in homeopathy) demonstrate the action of (a remedy) by seeing what effect it produces in a healthy individual.
